website_summaries.verdict: This sleek, durable case will protect your Apple Watch against dirt, debris, and other damage.
pros: Case is constructed from TPU material
Simple to install in just seconds
Transparent case fits a wide range of wrist straps
Precise cutout ensures the case won't interfere with an Apple Watch's buttons or knob
cons: Case tends to stretch over time
Water sometimes can penetrate the case

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Thais product has saved my I watch from getting so many scratches. The band is almost 1 year old and is starting to discolor. When you sweat a lot or get it wet the water gets trapped between the watch and the screen protector and is time consuming trying to take off the watch bands to get to the screen protector, but overall a great protector!
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, easy to put on! I ordered this for the Apple series 3 Watch I got for Christmas, and already it’s paid for itself. I’m getting a screen cover too, but this really does protect the entire watch. I just had to do a quick maneuver with the band to get this on, but it’s a PERFECT fit!
customer_reviews.author: KristinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Case inhibits microphone and wrist movements
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this case in the beginning and used it for about a week and a half. Then, suddenly my watch (series 3) started having issues with the microphone being slow and when I would twist my wrist the screen wouldn't light up at all. I restarted the watch and that didn't work so later that night I took the case off instead. The case was definitely inhibiting the microphone usage and the device wasn't registering my movements. I'm giving it two stars because it's super protective and survived a week in Disneyland, I'm sad to be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Like how’s its transparent and shows the rose off. It’s protects the side from scuffs. Simple to put on. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: susana

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It’s just perfect and just what I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! It’s just perfect and just what I needed☺️ It fits perfectly on my Apple Watch but was a little hard to put on but it’s all worth it . But I wish it had a screen protector though
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I am glad to have this now to protect the silly design ...
customer_reviews.text: This is small but mighty. Yes it adds some plastic to my watch but after having the watch fall off the nightstand face down on the floor with a resulting bursting out of all the "watch guts", I am glad to have this now to protect the silly design of the watch. If it falls now, there is a nice brim of plastic to save the watch. (My watch was replaced by Apple as it was not repairable but it still cost me $$. This simple case does not touch my skin so does not make it hot to wear. It goes around the rim of my watch, protecting the glass.)
customer_reviews.author: Max&Lani

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Had this on for a few moments and absolutely hated it. It made my watch feel and look really bulky. It did fit fine and for some may be perfect. UPDATE: The company reached out and gave me a full refund, and also sent me a new band and bumper. I am still not a fan of the bumper, but absolutely love my new band and appreciate their help.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Dawson

customer_reviews.title: I love this. It’s perfect on my watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It’s perfect on my watch. Appears to provide good protection and like other reviewers noted, you can hardly tell it’s on there (minimal bulk). I use it with a tempered glass screen protector. I’m very pleased so far with this bumper for my watch. Shipping was right on time and price was reasonable. The fit is perfect on my series 1 Apple Watch. We couldn’t afford a 2/3 and I certainly can’t afford to replace the one I have. Love my watch , and love that it’s got this protection on it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of a clutz, and I kept hitting the face of my Apple Watch 3 on doorframes while walking through my house. I knew I needed to get something to help protect my watch from my clumsiness. I took a chance and ordered this clear watch case in the 38mm size. I was not expecting much because the cost of this watch cover seemed so inexpensive - but I am happily surprised that it fits perfectly and works incredibly well. It isn't obtrusive or ugly, and it gives my watch a little bumper protection. I would recommend this watch cover for your Apple Watch! it's a great value and works well!
customer_reviews.author: Hpg

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: So far have loved the case! Fit perfect and has covered well. I am verh ruff with watches so this has been a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon costumer EA

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the material to be almost like a jelly feel to it. This case is like a plastic box and it’s difficult to bend and mold. It’s very difficult to put on the watch but that’s a good thing! Because this case isn’t going to come off the watch either. I bought two so I’d have a back up but honestly feel like this little case is going to last a very long time. I’m very accident prone and I know the case has already been through quite a bit. It doesn’t scuff and it’s hardly even noticeable on the watch.
customer_reviews.author: AREPARIS

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Apple Watch Case for my Apple Watch Series 3 watch. The case is easy to install - just remove your watch straps and pop the case into the protective wrap. Overall, the case fits snugly and doesn't distract from the watch appearance. I have access to all functioning buttons. This watch face itself is NOT covered, this protects the metal outer band of the watch. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Velikova

customer_reviews.title: Its a good protector for the Apple watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought the watch bumper a couple of weeks ago and really like it. It's like a little security blanket around my Apple watch. I had a FitBit before and had scratched the face from top to bottom so I was particularly worried I would do the same thing to my watch. Its clear so you can still see the rose color. But you can tell, slightly, that there is a cover on the watch but not so much it changes the look. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect but charging issues
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because i heard bad reviews of bumpers that incorporated screen protectors where water would get under the protector and the watch wouldn't respond until dry. well the case was great but unfortunately it would not charge with case on, even though it looked like the charger was flush it did not charge overnight. as soon as i took case off it charged with no issues. on a side note (not manufacturers/sellers problem) if you use a screen protector and this case the screen protector will get pulled up and stuck to this case.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is better than expected, with a great fit and tough feel. I would like a bit more of the back covered, but it works fine. The watch seems very protected by the guard, but I did add a screen protector just in case. Though most people don’t seem to notice it, I’ve been told it isn’t the best looking.
customer_reviews.author: helpfulmouse

customer_reviews.title: Helps Protect iWatch...
customer_reviews.text: This has been effective at protecting my iWatch. The edges are higher than the screen, offering protection for the screen. I’ve been using this for about 9 months with no real complaints. I remove it periodically to clean the inevitable gunk that gets inside the case. It’s really helped to protect my watch.
customer_reviews.author: MTAbear

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to protect my very expensive Apple Watch. I see so many people wearing their watches without some sort of protection. They are likely the same people who don’t buy cases for their very expensive Apple phone, absolute daredevils. Easy to put on, easy to take off. I only remove mine to clean it once a week and every time I accidentally bump my watch up against something I thank my lucky stars I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection but turns yellow
customer_reviews.text: Great product because it protects very well. I slam my wrists into the wall continually and the bumper is all scratched up but the watch is pristine. (I have the clear coat on it to from Mobile Outfitters on the display.) Only issue is the bumper is has turned yellow but for the price Im just going to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: dep hair gel

customer_reviews.title: Protects well but messes with watch
customer_reviews.text: At first it worked great. I’m constantly hitting my watch on things and needed something to protect it. It was bulky and sharp on my wrist and I t took me a while to get used to it. After a month, it was still uncomfortable to wear. It started causing my watch to act up after a week or two of wearing it. Siri would randomly go off, my heart rate wasn’t recorded normally, and it would frequently disconnect from the charger. I took it off my watch and everything went back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Katlin

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again !
customer_reviews.text: It’s not bulky at all which i love. I was super confused on how to put it on then when i finally figured it out i saw the instructions afterwards lol opps! Honest mistake but anyway i love how this also protects the screen in a way because you’d need to dip to get onto the screen so i have yet to buy a screen protector. You can’t beat the price i bought one for myself and my gf she also loves it! I like the material it’s made from it makes it easier to handle. All in all very good buy not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I had a thicker “armor” case on before (as I tend to bump into things often), but talk to text didn’t work very well. Just put this on my watch which was very easy. It’s bendy yet sturdy. Fits as expected. And so far talk to text seems to be working just fine with this on. Now I just have to get cute bands!
customer_reviews.author: Stormyy

customer_reviews.title: Expectations were more than met!
customer_reviews.text: I had my watch for two days with no protection, and between bumping it on counters and scraping it on doors I realized pretty quickly that I needed a case for it. What I like about this case Is that it’s clear, doesn’t mess with my ability to touch the screen or buttons, and is raised enough that I feel safe dropping and bumping the watch. I would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: One star is too many. This is a cheap knock off. The case had the home button at the bottom right and top left (depending on how you turn it. Either way it does not work. I emailed thei customer service and no reply. Do not purchase and I am so confused how this had so many stars to begin with. I have an Apple Watch 3.
customer_reviews.author: leah mallinger

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to keep my Apple Watch safe from the scuffs and me bumping it on things (I’m clumsy). And it’s barely noticeable and blends in with the watch color. Perfect in every way! So far it hasn’t yellowed or broke or anything but I will update if anything changes!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: good for price!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is not too bulky and looks cute on. Feels slightly different on my skin with the case on as opposed to not. I have no screen protector on with this bumper case and have had zero scratches! The bumper is slightly raised to prevent the screen from touching surfaces. Also, I wear this case underwater all the time and no issues there. MAYBE slight water stains underneath but nothing bad at all. Overall, great purchase:)
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I scratched the edge of my 38mm watch while walking around my building at work 3 days after I got it. My wrist grazed a wall when I turned a corner of the building. Argh! So I looked online and found this clear case to protect my watch from future accidents from my flailing arms. It arrived quickly and was easy to put on. It adds some bulk to the watch but being clear it’s more stylish than clunky. I love how it protects the entire perimeter of the watch. The case coupled with a separate protector over the face give me peace of mind with less wasted energy spent worrying about protecting my watch.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: Works as far as protecting the watch. I give the case 5 stars for that. The only reason I gave it 4 is because it discolors. The case darkens over time. I wish it would just stay clear. It is cheap enough to replace when the color starts to bother you but that seems wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: super Fit while maintaining functionality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Fit for your iWatch. this will not make your iWatch look like a different watch like the other covers make it look. you will be surprised that the watch still looks good The functional parts of your watch are still accessible easily. The thickness is just right too. Would recommend this for anyone who is looking to protect their watch while not making it look like a different watch.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect the face of the watch 👎
customer_reviews.text: Does not provide any protection for the face of the watch just the sides. There are other products that I found after the fact that are available at a cheaper price that provides all around protection of the face and all sides. I would not recommend this product. 2 stars as it provides some level of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it would be great to protect from scratches but the bottom ridge started irritations my skin not even a full hour in and making a square in my arm. So I loosened my strap not just once but twice and it would still irratate my wrist and I had to take it off. If was very rough against my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kim. D

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on your watch, otherwise great
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to get this cover on your Apple Watch because you have to stretch it over the buttons which was really difficult. Once it was on, it's great. I love how it looks and feels and it def protects my Apple Watch from getting dinged on doors/walls/etc.
customer_reviews.author: Carli D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Fits well and is easy to put on. I love that I can still see my watch color. Isn’t bulky and doesn’t add a ton to the size of the watch face. I don’t notice any difference from having the case vise not having one. I also like that the buttons aren’t blocked like with a lot of cases.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Very protective and slim
customer_reviews.text: This case is a great buy! It helps protect my apple watch without taking up a ton of space on my wrist. I purchased a similar product from another company and that case was bulky, but this case is very slim and about the same size as having your watch naked on your wrist. My one friend compared his watch without a case to mine with the case on and there was a very minimal difference in size that he was very impressed and couldnt even tell. Would recommend to anyone that needs the additional protection on their watch.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Fusco

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation, Gets the Job done has far as protection.
customer_reviews.text: It fit like a glove, and it surely protects my apple watch from scratches and bumps which it is so prone to doing. For the price, it is worth it as you don't need anything fancy. The TPU is thick enough to protect against any abrasions. Should there be yellowing over time, I'd probably just buy a new one but so far, there has been no discoloration and it has been a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Ta

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister as a gift since she had asked for an apple watch case. So far so good, except I expected the screen to be covered too. This only covers the edges and serves as a bumper. Overall it was good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: this thing fits really snug - go slow with the install. 15 year old son uses it on his Apple Watch and it does a good job of protecting it. He is a rough and tumble kind of kid and he has had his watch saved by this inexpensive protector!
customer_reviews.author: David Khachadoorian

customer_reviews.title: Solid Case
customer_reviews.text: This protective case is quite alright for its price. The only major downside is that the Digital Crown is substantially covered by the case. All in all, the case is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Shaela Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t notice it...
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this case as I’ve had it on for about a week is that I don’t notice it’s there really. It does not detract from the look of the watch yet thus far has acted as a protective barrier. I’m not clumsy or prone to banging my wrist, but I still wanted to have this watch have some protection. Good product thus far!
customer_reviews.author: VGilmore

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap price, but the product feels like it will last awhile. It definitely won't slip off. Gives good coverage without making the watch too bulky. The only reason I gave 4 stars was it was kind of hard to put on and take off, which makes cleaning kind of difficult, but overall I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for an Apple Watch 'bumper' this is the one
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several different brands over the last couple years and this is the best of the bunch. It fits well and creates a little rim to protect your watch face. Best yet it doesn't yellow and get hard like the rest did.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fujioka

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a veterinarian, so you can only imagine what I do daily. This cover has saved my Apple Watch many times! I’m super thankful for it. I bang this thing on so many different objects, or it gets bit by animals and never once had an issue with my Apple Watch being damaged or scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: very good, light weight
customer_reviews.text: its as in the picture. its very flexible and fits the 38mm very well. However, I had the screen protector on and the case barely handles the extra screen protector. Other than that, its very light weight. Like it so far, will see how long the clear case last. Will update, if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: ptspoon

customer_reviews.title: Why a square cutout for a round sensor?
customer_reviews.text: The case is very well made and easy to install, but with my sensitive skin the edge of square opening on the back of the case was a little irritating to my skin. With that being said the sellers provided excellent customer service! They were very responsive and were more than willing to refund my money or replace the item. I would buy from this seller again based on my customer service experience alone.
customer_reviews.author: LM Mattie

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Protects very well my Apple Watch. I like that it is transparent, so I can still see the rose gold color. I paired it with a skin protector adesive, so now my Apple Watch is fully protected. I like that I don’t need to remove this bumper to change the band.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea V

customer_reviews.title: Great product gr8 price gr8 value for your money and protection for ur watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is the product u need if u want to protect your phone while not making it look different than Apple intended it to be. I have a 42 mm black watch and my wife has a 38 mm rose gold watch. They both look classy after putting this on. This does offer an all round protection to ur watch. Putting it on is easy and it fits well. Great product for a gr8 price.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik

customer_reviews.title: seems to work great. Wish someone would make this in a dark ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well to protect the corners and hopefully will protect my watch if I drop it. The plastic is cut out to fit around all of the ports and the dial on the right side of the watch, but it is solid on the button you push to access your apps, etc. It's a little weird and hard to push to get your apps to come up. Otherwise, seems to work great. Wish someone would make this in a dark or smokey color so it would look better on a dark watch.
customer_reviews.author: MeggoRuns2

customer_reviews.title: Good screen protector, but be ware
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I see is that you cannot install a screen protector with Watch case, it keeps on Peeling it off by slightly shifting on the watch. If you don’t intend on using a screen protector, this is a five stars product.
customer_reviews.author: Tadek

customer_reviews.title: Watch the video; only 4 stars bc it is harder to get on and can yellow over time
customer_reviews.text: This is a must to keep your phone extra safe. I could get used to the somewhat difficult way to put it over your watch. The yellowing is more frustrating, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Tanz mom

customer_reviews.title: This Apple Watch case protects my Series 3 wonderfully! The fit is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This Apple Watch case protects my Series 3 wonderfully! The fit is perfect, the cutouts are on point and the sleek design does not take away from the watch appearance itself, which is exactly what I was looking for. Protect your investment and order this today!
customer_reviews.author: JKnox

customer_reviews.title: Has Protected My Watch
customer_reviews.text: I had my first Apple watch 1-2 weeks before I cracked the watch face. I knew that when I got my replacement I needed something to keep it well protected. After trying several different protectors, I came across this little gem. It protects my watch from all the bumps and bangs of everyday life. It isn't bulky or very noticeable on the watch face. I do occasionally remove it to clean under the cover and clean the cover itself.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Pitts

customer_reviews.title: would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: have only had this on my watch for about 1 1/2 weeks so can’t speak on the actual durability, but it was super easy to put on and fits perfect. Doesn’t add too much bulk to the look
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Clear, flexible protection.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is clear so it doesn’t aesthetically make it look cheap. Very easy to put on. I can’t give it 5 stars comfortably without knowing what it’s extent of its protection. I dropped my first iwatch on tile floor from waist high and it cracked the screen horribly. I bought this as a reactive response to that incident and I hope it doesn’t happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love their follow up
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, I love their follow up, I wish the item was just a little thicker or something to protect the face more or had screen protection built in THIS PRODUCT is good thou protects everything else and the face just want more protections.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri D Diamond

customer_reviews.title: I bought the clear TPU protector and was wondering if it were better if I chose the black one
customer_reviews.text: I am careless with my watches. I get bumps here and there because I am active. This TPU protector complements the screen protector that I bought. I bought the clear TPU protector and was wondering if it were better if I chose the black one. Maybe next time. This TPU protector does the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaF

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Wish it was a bit thinner.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply off and on (which you will need to do since dust gets trapped under it frequently.) I wish it was a bit thinner but overall great!
customer_reviews.author: JeffdaRev

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to attach
customer_reviews.text: I received this and immediately put it on my Apple Watch. It was easy to attach, was a snug fit, and less bulky than I feared it would be. Being clear, it doesn't distract from the band or look cumbersome or awkward. Combined with the screen protector I also purchased, I think it's going to do a great job protecting my investment!
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: Protective and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I have an Apple watch 2 series. This case is Flexible and Very easy to Install. It definitely protects my watch. Charging with this case is no problem. All the buttons, speaker, etc. are perfectly aligned with the openings on the case. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: TechShopper

customer_reviews.title: Better than the $30 case I got at Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: I got a $30 cover at Best Buy when I bought my watch but it popped off after a couple weeks and was lost forever. This one is far better! I love the design of this flexible clear case cover- it goes around the watch band so it can't pop off and get lost! The clear color makes it barely noticeable. I wish I had bought this before wasting my money at Best Buy. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Kachinske

customer_reviews.title: It fit great! I wear my watch in the shower and ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit great! I wear my watch in the shower and this allowed water to collect between the case and the watch. I didnt want to have to take it off and dry it after each shower. Other than that it is a fine product, esp for the low price. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Walk

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: This case cover fits my Apple Watch series 3 perfectly and offers protection from scuffs and scratches. I have a screen protector on the Apple Watch and this clear cover doesn’t affect the screen protector. Overall good product for normal everyday use of the Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: FSL

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. (Clip on from the back). Compatible with screen protectors. Comfortable, and allows full access to dial and buttons. Protects the metal casing of the watch, clear cover doesn’t interfere with the watch color design.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Bullard

customer_reviews.title: I originally had the chrome and loved the way it looked on my watch
customer_reviews.text: I originally had the chrome and loved the way it looked on my watch. Perfect fit for the series 3. The chrome wore off in some spots so I decided to try the clear. I don’t like it, looks cheap. Get the chrome, makes the watch look more like a piece of jewelry rather than a sport watch.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix-412

customer_reviews.title: Mine turned yellow and stiff!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product back in November last year and it is already stiff and turning yellow. Sorry for the bad review, maybe using surgical grade silicone or something along that line. The fit was great, the quality not so great.
customer_reviews.author: Klawtrax

customer_reviews.title: Like the flexibility, good protection
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s flexible. The only two cons are 1) it doesn’t have a screen protector on it, which some do (but that’s probably my fault for not reading the description - easy fix, just bought one) and 2) dust/dirt tends to collect under the top, in between the case and the watch. Otherwise, it works as expected and protects the watch.
customer_reviews.author: J+H B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection without even knowing it’s there!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted for a little extra protection with my watch. Touch screen and buttons all work perfectly. I have clear, so you don’t even notice that it is there. It fits exactly as it should. The band slides back on with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tim R. Burgiss

customer_reviews.title: Misleading in looks, yet protective where it counts!
customer_reviews.text: I feel the case to be a bit false advertise because on the pictures we see one thing however in person is another, I realized this after having it, not that it’s nto secure on the co ready the pros outweights the pros. However the clearness of the plastic is not as concealing to the watch as I had hope you can still notice the case while wearing it, on the picture it seems to almost banish and become one with the whatch as if mergin colors; then again this is purely an asthetics issue and nothing wrong with the case itself therefore I believe it deserves the 5 starts!
customer_reviews.author: J. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install, but good product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard to install, but I think that’s good because it gives a snug fit! Love that it doesn’t cover my screen. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a bumper (or case) for my watch that wraps around enough that it won't fall off if I hit it wrong! I've lost 3 bumpers already because they calmed off to easy. A little hard to put on because it fits right and wraps a little on the back, but I'll take that over having to replace it every month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good protection
customer_reviews.text: Great screen protector; does a good job protecting my Apple Watch. Fits great Nice and flexible allowing for easy on, easy off. Does need to be removed and cleaned especially after any type of exercising and sweating.
customer_reviews.author: JJGJ-lakelovers

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy trash make u pay to send it back
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product it does not fit on your Apple Watch 42MM Can’t even get the watch band on lunch it’s on none of the buttons lineup
customer_reviews.author: crystal Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and durability of this bumper. I feel protected against bumps and drops on the edges. And I used it with a glass screen protector and it seemed to lift a little bit but holds it down well. It did create a little bubble on screen protector from lift but nothing horrible and I feel totally protected now. Screen and sides.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I hope it works like bumper cases for phones and preventing the crystal from ...
customer_reviews.text: This very light bumper is discreet. I hope it works like bumper cases for phones and preventing the crystal from impact if dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rosete

customer_reviews.title: Very protective, and helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This case saved my apple watch! Somehow I caught a bad luck streak and broke my apple watch’s screen the day after purchasing it. I bought this case on amazon and have had no issues with glass breaking since! I don’t personally think it gets overly yellow over time, and I don’t think it’s bulky either. Very flattering on the watch, and doesn’t distract while still being durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney H ♥️

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, kind of bulky on the watch though so I don’t usually put it on
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Good Case
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this product for my wife. She loves this case for her watch. The other one was super dirty but she has had it on her watch for almost 2 years. So it was time for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Functions fine but turns yellow after a couple months of wear. Also gets less flexible so I expect the next time I have to take it off to clean around it, it will break. Another drawback it gets gross underneath and needs to be taken off and cleaned around.
customer_reviews.author: Shippfamily

customer_reviews.title: Affordable protection!
customer_reviews.text: I took a little while to review these being that I wanted to test out the durability. These have been great so far!! I’ve accidentally hit the sides of my watch on doors, walls, counters... you name it! This protected the watch just like it should! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was not satisfied with the case for my watch because it doesn’t protect the face of the watch and that is what I needed most! I was going to send it back since I was not pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works! Protects my watch. But...
customer_reviews.text: This definitely protects against bumps and scratches around the edges, which is what I needed it for. It does add some bulk to the watch, though. I was hoping it would be slimmer. Also, it catches dust and dirt under it, and I have to take it completely off the watch (and remove the band) to clean it. However, this is something I’m willing to do to protect my watch.
customer_reviews.author: Dava Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my watch and haven't looked back. It doesn't look terrible and it protects nicely. Since it is flexible, I imagine you could use a tempered glass screen protector along with it, though I haven't tried yet.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, easy to add to watch and no bumps or scratches thus far. I like how it pairs well, aesthetically, with the leather straps I also recently purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Shawndiego18

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have gotten this a long time ago. Definitely saving on the wear on my watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sara V Notman

customer_reviews.title: Good but Kinda Dirty looking
customer_reviews.text: I really like the clear bumper. It seems like it got dirty really fast but it hasn't stopped me from using it. I have taken it off and washed it in the sink but it still seems dirtier than not. One thing I don't like is that when my watch crown is acting funny I have to take the case off to fix it, but that is more of having an old watch issue and not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Wince

customer_reviews.title: Decent Apple watch case, can be better with a little improvements
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent bumper case for my apple watch. I like that it is lightweight and clear. However, it's a little bit bulky than I expected. The front part of the bumper is somewhat hard and the back part is softer. I think it would be better if the front part is softer too since the harder front part makes it more difficult to put the case on. I accidentally scraped the screen protector of my apple watch when putting on the case. Overall, it's a good buy, but I will like the slimmer and softer version more.
customer_reviews.author: Vania Gracia

customer_reviews.title: Great protector for my Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it is to put on and thatnthe color of my watch isn’t changed. When wearing my watch I don’t even notice it is there
customer_reviews.author: Kay Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. A week before receiving this item, I had purchased a high-quality screen protector for my watch. Unfortunately, upon putting this case on, it lifted the edges of my screen protector. I tried to let it go for a bit and would attempt to push down the edges but any movement of the case made it worse. Eventually I had to take off the protector which cost more than the case itself. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clear case!! Looks great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my clear Apple Watch case! Fairly easy to put on the watch. Looks great and I’m sure it will protect the sides and edges just fine!! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: kim smart

customer_reviews.title: Slim case with good side bumpers
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need something for my actual screen but just the sides of my watch because I'm always knocking it on the door way or table as I walk by. Protects well and isn't bulky. Makes me feel a lot better about keeping my watch nice.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: A must for any Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Don’t buy the one that covers the face of the watch since it makes the watch sweat. This one just covers the edge of the watch. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Super easy to put on the watch and keeps it secure. I have the tendency to bump my hands into things and with this case on my watch I’m confident it won’t get damaged. Also it is super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Malgorzata

customer_reviews.title: I needed this fast and it came ver6 quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I needed this fast as I had just purchased my Apple Watch. I work in the yard and knew it was important to protect the face of the watch immediately. I think the case is hardly noticeable but does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My wife’s iwatch hasn’t broken, so there’s a plus. It’s a great protection for your iwatch and lets you access your screen better.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far - has protected my I watch ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Great product so far - has protected my I watch from numerous scrapes at work. So far works great with different watch band as well. Works well so far with glass screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: classicaljess

customer_reviews.title: the fit, its purpose and style
customer_reviews.text: The clear case met my expectations, fits my 38mm IWATCH perfectly and was easy to install... I will reorder from OULUOQI, when the clear soft case requires replacement. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it... doesn’t make my watch look super bulky and I don’t have to worry about the case scratching the watch when I take it off or put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Maria DelaCruz

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 38mm series 1
customer_reviews.text: Peace of mind, I wear my watch everywhere & it would take a beating if I didn't protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Square eyes

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly on the watch. Love that I can still see rose gold color of the bezel. Comes up and over screen to protect it while not covering screen completely.
customer_reviews.author: C.Daw

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great but got dirty and dingy looking after a few months
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Get yours now!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great item so far. I haven’t had a significant event to test how well the case protects my watch, but I have hit the corners on the wall a few times aready and it’s still looking good. It does not feel bulky, is the perfect size, and does not fog like the other cases (where the watch face is covered as well).
customer_reviews.author: K C

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it looks n easy maintenance
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks n easy maintenance, it doesn’t cover the screen so easy while exercise n wash dishes no need to take it off the cover to clean. I had one with screen cover it broke very fast n I need to take the cover off every time When I exercise r wash dishes
customer_reviews.author: Hosakote Nagaraj

product_meta.title: OULUOQI Compatible with Apple Watch Case 38mm, Clear Soft TPU Protector Compatible with iWatch Case Cover Compatible with Apple Watch Series 3, Series 2, Series 1, Sport, Edition
feature_bullets: ✓ : For 18 months after the date of purchase, we take care of all quality-related issues with a REPLACEMENT or REFUND. Pals contact our OULUOQI support team.

✓ Sleekly and Protective: It's thick enough to provide protection, yet sleek enough to barely notice its there. The transparent case also do not cover the color of the watch, fit for all kinds of straps you liked.
✓ Special Design: Precise cutouts does not interfere with any of the buttons or knob, also not affection to band insertion and watch charging.
✓ Attribute: The case is pretty much invisible on the watch, fit for working indoor/outdoor construction , can protect your watch from scratched and broke .
✓ Application: Pals noticed that the case is not including a full screen protector. Perfectly fit for 38mm watch Series 3,Series 2,Series 1, Sport, Edition.
